mapper.insert: insert into db_pfccountry (ID, COUNTRYID, COUNTRYCODE, NAMECN, NAMEEN, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, ORDERTYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countrycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_pfccountry set COUNTRYID = #{countryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRYCODE = #{countrycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMECN = #{namecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEEN = #{nameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERTYPE = #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, COUNTRYID, COUNTRYCODE, NAMECN, NAMEEN, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, ORDERTYPE from db_pfccountry where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID, COUNTRYID, COUNTRYCODE, NAMECN, NAMEEN, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, ORDERTYPE from db_pfccountry
